definitions.definition: A reflection after an act; a later or subsequent thought, action , or expedient .
examples: She packed her sandals only as an afterthought , but she was glad she did.

definitions.definition: Something additional to the original plan or concept.
examples: This whole remodeling was an afterthought ; we were only going to paint and call it good.

main_definition: A reflection after an act; a later or subsequent thought, action , or expedient .
secondary_definitions: Something additional to the original plan or concept.
